# Jordan-national-cybersecurity-ctf-2021 (cyber talents)
Category : `Crypto`

Challenge name : `IBM` 

```
description : 
What do you know about IBM cryptosystem 1970?
```
step 1 
```bash
bash -c 'for i in $(seq 1 100);do nc ip port ; done'  > cipher
```
content of cipher file :

step 2 

now, you can solved the challenge by weak key for Des algorithm
```py

fbac203582ebab1922ecc5bacca5ae34577157c06a1ae268ba50e3b3c8e97bd2
fd9e06c278969b3ddf53e45ddf00f0b11d40b36dc536bc9611155a3c1e002f30'''

ciphertext=flag_enc.split('\n')

key =  ['0x0000000000000000','0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF','0xE1E1E1E1F0F0F0F0','0x1E1E1E1E0F0F0F0F']
for j in ciphertext:    
    for i in key:
        bytes_object = bytes.fromhex(i[2:])
        a = DES.new(bytes_object, DES.MODE_ECB)
        plaintext = a.decrypt(bytes.fromhex(j))
        if b'flag{' in plaintext:
            print(plaintext)
            exit(0)
```

```
Flag : flag{n1ce_You_Got_1T}
ref : https://twitter.com/irsheidat1/status/1420816173361508352
```
